statements: SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, resolution FROM customer_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 101;
SELECT agent_id, assigned_date FROM customer_tickets WHERE customer_id = 201 ORDER BY assigned_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE resolved_date IS NOT NULL AND resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, ticket_status FROM customer_tickets WHERE agent_id = 301 AND ticket_status IN ('open', 'pending') ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT ticket_id, assigned_date, resolved_date FROM customer_tickets ORDER BY resolved_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, agent_id, ticket_status FROM customer_tickets WHERE agent_id IS NOT NULL AND resolved_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM customer_tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING ticket_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01' AND resolved_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT agent_name, specialization, agent_id FROM agents;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE status='open';
SELECT customer_id, status FROM customer_tickets ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_id FROM agents WHERE specialization='IT Support';
SELECT customer_id, resolution FROM customer_tickets WHERE status='resolved';
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, status, resolution FROM customer_tickets WHERE customer_id = 101 AND agent_id = 201 ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, specialization FROM agents WHERE agent_id IN (201, 202, 203) ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM customer_tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_tickets > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets INNER JOIN agents ON customer_tickets.agent_id = agents.agent_id WHERE customer_id = 102;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE status='Resolved';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id='1234';
SELECT agent_name, department FROM agents WHERE department='Sales' ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, status FROM customer_tickets WHERE resolution IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE status='Open' AND agent_id='9876';
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE status='open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_name, department, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM agents JOIN customer_tickets ON agents.agent_id = customer_tickets.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name, department;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets WHERE agent_id IN (SELECT agent_id FROM agents WHERE department='Sales');
SELECT customer_name, resolution FROM customers JOIN customer_tickets ON customers.customer_id = customer_tickets.customer_id WHERE status='resolved' ORDER BY resolution DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_text FROM customer_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'closed';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_text, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets;
SELECT customer_id, ticket_status FROM customer_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT resolution_text, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_resolution FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT resolution_text, resolution_date FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT agent_name, assignment_date FROM agents JOIN assignments ON agents.agent_id = assignments.agent_id;
SELECT r.resolution_text, t.ticket_status FROM resolutions r JOIN tickets t ON r.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE r.resolution_date = '2022-01-15';

SELECT c.customer_name, t.ticket_status, a.agent_name FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN assignments ass ON t.ticket_id = ass.ticket_id JOIN agents a ON ass.agent_id = a.agent_id WHERE t.ticket_status = 'Closed';
